article_title: Bob Ashby: Freedom legislation is a sad necessity
article_text:
— Bob Ashby is a resident of Holland. He can be contacted at

, where previous articles are archived.

article_metadata.description: Georg Hegel (1770-1831) is hardly a household name but his social and political philosophy gave rise to Marxism, communism and to Barack Obama's low view of America and its constitution. For Hegel, the "state" is almost everything. He taught that the state "has the supreme right against; the individual, whose supreme duty is to be a member of the state ... for the right of the world spirit is above all special privileges..." The Obama administration is the three-headed child of
article_metadata.author: Bob Ashby Community Columnist
